ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: My problem was I got accepted into the beta and before the disk came a friend s kid pulled the PS2 down and broke it :) hehe just got it fixed after beta of
ygData.messageBody:
My problem was I got accepted into the beta and before the disk came a
friend's kid pulled the PS2 down and broke it :) hehe just got it fixed
after beta of course :(


----- Original Message -----
From: "Howler D. Wolfe" <howler@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, February 22, 2003 2:40 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined


> Hi Xurtin,
>
> I was in all three BETAs for EQOA. I think if you are comming from the PC
> version of EQ, even if its been a while since you last played, that you
will
> probably be a little disappointed. The graphics are ok, but the game play
> mechanics were just not my cup of tea.
>
> Then again, I'm sure they've made huge strides since I last played the PS2
> BETA, so its probably worth it to try it out for yourself and make your
own
> conclusions.
>
> I know its not much info, but its really all I have. I hope this helped
you
> in some way. :-)
>
> -Oskar
>
